# Background Music Setup

The pet simulator now supports automatic background music playback!

## üéµ Music Plays Automatically!

**Good news**: Background music now works immediately! The game generates chill ambient music automatically, or you can add your own music file.

## Option 1: Use Auto-Generated Music (Works Now!)

- ‚úÖ **No setup required** - chill ambient music plays automatically
- ‚úÖ **Piano-like melody** with soft ambient pads
- ‚úÖ **Relaxing atmosphere** for pet care

## Option 2: Add Your Own Music (Optional)

1. **Download free music** from: https://incompetech.com/ (Kevin MacLeod)
   - Search for "Ambient" or "Peaceful" tracks
   - Example: "Floating Cities", "Peaceful Piano", "Relaxing Music"

2. **Save as MP3**:
   - Download any chill/ambient track
   - Convert to MP3 if needed
   - Keep file size under 10MB

3. **Place in this folder**:
   - Rename file to: `background-music.mp3`
   - Replace the existing `background-music.mp3.txt` file
   - Your music will override the auto-generated music!

## How Auto-Play Works:

- ‚úÖ **Automatic**: Starts when entering pet care screen
- ‚úÖ **Interactive**: Plays on first click/keyboard press if needed
- ‚úÖ **Looping**: Music repeats continuously
- ‚úÖ **Volume**: Set to comfortable background level (30%)
- ‚úÖ **Stop**: Automatically stops when leaving pet care

## Alternative Sources:

- **Free Music Archive**: https://freemusicarchive.org/ (search "ambient")
- **YouTube Audio Library**: Search "royalty free ambient music"
- **OpenGameArt**: https://opengameart.org/art-search-advanced?keys=&field_art_type_tid%5B%5D=13

## Console Messages:

- **"‚úÖ Background music loaded from file!"** - Your MP3 is playing
- **"üéµ Chill background music started!"** - Auto-generated music is playing
- **"üìÅ No music file found, generating chill background music..."** - Fallback activated

Enjoy the relaxing background music while caring for your pets! üéµ‚ú®
